messages.subject: play clay
messages.msgSnippet: Play clay (yield: 1.5 cups) 1/2 cup salt 1/2 cup hot water 1/2 cup cold water 1/2 cup cornstarch mix the salt into the water and bring it to a boit stir the
messages.messageBody:
Play clay
(yield: 1.5 cups)

1/2 cup salt
1/2 cup hot water
1/2 cup cold water
1/2 cup cornstarch

mix the salt into the water and bring it to a boit
stir the cornstarch into the cold water
add the two mixtures together and stir vigorously to avoid lumping
cook the mixture over low heat, stirring constantly until it thickens, it
should resemble the consistency of pie dough
remove the mixture from the heat and let it cool
knead the mixture until it is soft and pliable

This is an excellent dough to roll out and use for flat items and Christmas
decorations. It can be dried in the air overnight, or in the oven at two
hundred degrees for one hour.

Blessings,
Stephanie
Teacher and Mommy of 4 homeschooling fanatics, wife to the best principal,
protector of many pets and wild ones, and unpublished writer.

I think that I will move closer to the gym, that way between sets,
I can run home and eat something sweet to keep up my energy! s.
Believe in others, and be a part; believe in yourself, and be the lead.
s.
***Life's Learnings Academy - Protecting Our Children***
IT'S GREAT TO LEARN WHERE THE PRINCIPAL LOVES YOU
